name: SuperCraft
long_description:
SuperCraft is a privacy first, generative media platform for teams building physical products.

We help businesses securely use generative AI capabilities across their design departments for faster design exploration and visualization of physical products.

Fortune 500 companies are using SuperCraft to visualize how their product will look like in a real life scenario, before actually building it, and treat the design boards as a shared source of truth that all teams involved can collaborate and provide feedback on - resulting in faster design reviews, more creative exploration, and faster time to market.
